thread.section_title: Kensington Gardens Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice clean hotel.
thread.title_full: Nice clean hotel. - Review of Kensington Gardens Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Sarah S
title: Nice clean hotel.
text:
Lovely Hotel in a very quiet spot. Super old building with decor in keeping with the period. Spotlessly clean rooms and modern bathrooms. Comfy beds, had a great night sleep. Only downsize is no lift and we were on the top floor! Very good value for money, would recommend.
Room Tip: No lift, so if you have trouble with stairs contact the hotel first. See more room tips
